homeHeader.title: From Attestation to Licensing, We Handle Every Step of ^Mainland Company Formation in the UAE^
homeHeader.description: Frustrated by high setup costs, confusing activity lists, and complex approvals. At One Nexuz, we remove the guesswork to empower you with exciting tax incentives, flexible office spaces, and full local market access. Secure your Mainland license in as little as 3-5 business days to tap into high-growth sectors with our experts guiding you every step of the way.

leftSection_5.title: How One Nexuz Streamlines UAE Mainland Business Setup in 6 Simple Steps

items.title: Book Your Free Consultation
items.description: We’ll kick off the mainand business setup in the UAE by assessing your business goals and recommending legal structures and activities.

items.title: Secure Your Trade Name
items.description: Next, our expert consultants help craft a list of unique business names and get it registered with the DED.

items.title: Get all Initial Approvals
items.description: After your trade name is approved, we’ll assist you in compiling your passport copies, proposed trade name, and receiving pre-approvals.

items.title: Lease Your Office Space
items.description: Next, we'll help you select cost-effective physical, flexi-desk, or smart desk options, depending on your business activity.

items.title: Apply for Trade License
items.description: Once you’ve secured the best-fit office space, we’ll submit your application and receive your official trade license within 3-5 working days.

items.title: Get Your Visa & Bank Account
items.description: Our dedicated consultants offer holistic solutions to help you go beyond business setup, including bank account creation.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to set up a business in the UAE mainland?
items.answer: It generally takes 3-5 working days to set up a business in the UAE mainland.

items.question: How much tax do businesses have to pay on the UAE mainland?
items.answer: With the UAE’s newest regulation, you no longer have to pay corporate and personal income taxes.

items.question: What are the benefits of setting up a business in the UAE mainland?
items.answer: Setting up in the UAE mainland offers 100% foreign ownership, visa flexibility, and access to strategic locations.

items.question: How does One Nexuz help you get registered as a UAE mainland company?
items.answer: Our team of expert consultants streamlines the application and paperwork, allowing you to focus on growing your brand.

items.question: Do I get 100% ownership of my mainland company in the UAE mainland?
items.answer: Yes, per new business regulations, expats can now enjoy full foreign ownership, mitigating the hassle of hunting for a local sponsor.
